name: Back to Life!
description:
Due to an unfortunate mix-up, you have been ripped from the earth and sent to Hell. Fight your way to the depths of Hell, defeat the Ruler, and get your life back!

This game is playable, and winnable, but not at all well-balanced. I did what I could with the time I had, and I hope you enjoy!

Press " ? " in-game to learn the controls. Use arrow keys/numpad/mouse for movement. Diagonal movement is included.
